tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE StockExpiryDates (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name STRING,
  expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ExpiryAlert (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  alert_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_product_id FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES StockProduct(product_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_location_id FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES StockLocation(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE StockItems (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    expiry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ExpiryAlerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_item_id INT,
    alert_date DATE,
    alert_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AlertsHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_id INT,
    resolved BOOLEAN,
    resolution_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE WastageLog (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_item_id INT,
    wastage_date DATE,
    wastage_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_items (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	item_name VARCHAR(255),
	expiry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE stock_locations (
	location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	location_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE stock_quantity (
	quantity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	item_id INT,
	location_id INT,
	quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_notifications (
	notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	item_id INT,
	notification_msg TEXT,
	notification_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE stock_audit_log (
	audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	action VARCHAR(255),
	item_id INT,
	audit_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
